title: Breadcrumbs: overflow
code:
<gds-flex overflow="auto" width="80%" align-items="center" padding="xl">
    <gds-breadcrumbs min-width="600px" size="small">
      <gds-link href="#">
        <gds-icon-home-open slot="lead"></gds-icon-home-open>
        Home
      </gds-link>
      <gds-link href="#">
        <gds-icon-folder slot="lead"></gds-icon-folder>
        Documents
      </gds-link>
      <gds-button rank="tertiary" size="xs">
        <gds-icon-dot-grid-one-horizontal size="s"></gds-icon-dot-grid-one-horizontal>
      </gds-button>
      <gds-link href="#">
        <gds-icon-settings-gear slot="lead"></gds-icon-settings-gear>
        Settings
      </gds-link>
      <gds-text> Current page </gds-text>
    </gds-breadcrumbs>
</gds-flex>
